New Records: India recorded their biggest-ever win in terms of runs, beating New Zealand by 168 runs
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill hit a whirlwind unbeaten maiden century in the shortest format with 126 not out off 63 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India pocketed the hard-fought series 2-1 against New Zealand
Others: India's second-highest margin of victory was a 143-run win over Ireland in Dublin in 2018
